name: Dash Survivor
description:
TL;DR

Dash through everything. Avoid enemies except if you are invincible.

Update #2

New Power-up: NoLimits

Bugfixes, Power-ups balance, Nuke chain reaction, End stats

Click or Tap to Dash

Tap or click anywhere to dash. Your movements will be limited by the circle.

Your dash reload slowly at start, so beware and choose your target carefully.

Avoid enemies

Huge red glowing enemies damage your health. Avoid them at all cost, except if you are invicible... They may be useful to get a high score

Collect points 

Circle give points. Collect multiple circles during a single dash to get a score multiplier.

Enemies and already maxed bonuses also give points.

Collect items

Multiple power-ups can be discovered in the game. Dash through them to apply their power.

Check the bottom-left to see what each bonus is about.

Get the Highest Possible Score

More and more enemies will come as the game continues. Try to survive and get the highest score possible. Can you reach a million points? 5? 10? 100? The sky might be the limit...

Getting bigger is better for gathering points, but being small might be a good idea to survive...

Credits

A game made by Draelent for the Internet Game Jam with the theme "One Button"

Art, music and code by Draelent. Free SFX from freesound.org
